text: Donald Lee Stroud (born September 1, 1943) is an American actor, musician, and surfer. Stroud appeared with Clint Eastwood in two movies, Coogan's Bluff (1968) and Joe Kidd (1972). He played Sheriff Bob Sharp in the 2012 movie Django Unchained. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:Living people Category:American surfers Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from Honolulu Category:Musicians from Hawaii
title: Don Stroud
